channel.title: Juan's Tech Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Juan's Tech Blog

item.title: My First 3D Printer Creality Hi & 3 Failed Prints on My First Try!
item.description:
Recently, I got my first 3D printer, the Creality Hi.

I believe the usual first 3D print for a beginner should be the 3D Benchy. The printer itself even came preloaded with the model. But I chose to bite off more than I could chew by printing a Xiaomi Band 9 magnetic charging stand by benbryss.

YouTube Video

3 Failed 3D Printing Attempts

item.title: Create a Telegram Bot using JavaScript, Cloudflare Workers and Cloudflare Workers KV.
item.description: Step-by-step guide to set up Telegram bot with Botfather, serverless service Cloudflare Workers, data storage Cloudflare Workers KV and coding using JavaScript.

item.title: Running LLM and Stable Diffusion Locally on My Low-End Hardware
item.description: Try running Llama 3.2 1B Q8, Llama 3.2 3B Q8 & Stable Diffusion 1.5 on Intel UHD Graphics 630. Also, try to run AI models on the CPU.

item.title: How to Fix CH340 USB to Serial Driver 3.8 version issue.
item.description: CH340 USB-to-Serial Driver 3.8 version issue. It cause the Arduino IDE prompt "A device attached to the system is not functioning" error message.

item.title: Easy DIY Monitor Riser/Stand.
item.description: Build a Monitor riser/stand with the IKEA wall shelf and furniture legs.

item.title: DIY WS2812B Addressable LED Light Strip Controller with ESP32 and WLED.
item.description: Guide to Build a WS2812B Addressable LED Light Strip Controller with ESP32 and WLED.

item.title: How to install Hugo on Windows 11.
item.description: I just learned how to install Hugo with Go/Golang and Git.

item.title: Build Human Presence Sensor with ESP8266, LD2410 and ESPHome, Integrate into Home Assistant.
item.description: Build a human presence sensor with ESP8266, LD2410 mmWave radar sensor, and ESPHome, integrate into Home Assistant.

item.title: Integrate SONOFF Zigbee USB Dongle 3.0 Plus-P into Home Assistant.
item.description: I just learned how to mount the Zigbee dongle into Docker container and integrate it into Home Assistant.

item.title: Fixing Washing Machine Water Fill Issue.
item.description: Just repaired my washing machine water flow slow or water pressure low issue.
